value:
$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Aha! This is the Dream Gate... This
is the one place in Ljósálfheimr that
Gullinkambi will sou—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|So...you're finally here, Sweet Dream.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm... You must be Triandra! We knew
we'd catch up to you eventually!$k$pYou dökkálfar are the source of the
bad dreams plaguing the people of
Askr, aren't you? You have to stop!$k$pLeave this place, and free those
you've ensnared from your terrible,
wicked dreams!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|That is something we cannot do.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But I wonder... If something were
to happen to you...would the mortals
accept the nightmare as their reality?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh...$k$pSeems we've lost this time. Let's
retreat for now, Plumeria...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ugh. Those dökkálfar... Don't they
know they shouldn't do bad things,
because it makes other people sad?$k$p*sigh* Oh well. That should do it,
anyway. We should be ready to use
the horn Dream-King Freyr gave us.$k$pIf we sound it here and now, it should
bring $Nu back!$k$pSo...use it! C'mon, c'mon! I'm so
excited, I can hardly wait!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All right. I'll try...$k$pIn the name of Dream-King Freyr...
Grant us our awakening!$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|The sound of the horn... It seems
to have worked. How lovely.$k$pThe bad dreams are gone, and you
all will soon wake from your dream.$k$pIt's a little sad... We're nearing
our goodbyes...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Are you all right, Peony?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|It's just...the dream is ending.$k$pWhen you wake up, all of you will
forget about Ljósálfheimr, the
ljósálfar...me...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no! After we've just become
friends... It's too sad to bear!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I'm sorry, Sharena. But thank you.$k$pI will always watch over you.
Each of you...$k$pAnd maybe...someday...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Peony!$k$p...We'll meet again, someday.
Someday in a dream.$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|The horn sounds... Then they have
returned to the wor—$k$p...What are you doing here?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_07_2,0|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|It has been so long, Brother...and
this is how you greet me, your
beloved sister?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|I will ask once more, Freyja...
What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|The world is just so dull without
you, Brother.$k$pYou should come to my world...
Come with me, to Dökkálfheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|I must not. If I were to follow you
there, the mortal world would be
overrun with nightmare...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Well...perhaps. The dreams of mortals
would become reality, true... But any
nightmare would be their own doing...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Stop this, Freyja. Mortals should
be given pleasant things... All living
things deserve so much.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|It's sickening how highly you think
of them. Unfortunate such adoration
only strengthens my resolve.$k$pAnd now...here you are, having given
them the horn...leaving yourself with
no defense against me... Hmm...$k$pYou ought not have done that...
I alone am worthy of your love, your
admiration...your gifts...ANY of it!$k$pI will not be made a FOOL by some
pitiful beast that can barely manage
to control its most base impulses!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja, listen to m—$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Triandra, Plumeria... Seize him.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Lady Freyja.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Tch. Meddlesome mortals... With
the sounding of the horn, they'll be
waking any moment now...$k$pOh, how I wish I could see the looks
on their faces when the nightmare
chases them into their waking lives!$k$pI can think of no gift more suitable
for those who would steal from me
my brother's attentions... Suffering!$k$p$Sbs150|
